title: Goodbye LoL (AMA)

replies.body: You're not converting to that filthy DOTA are you?

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=wzR0UGN7,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-01-23T09:57:07.002+0000)
>
> You're not converting to that filthy DOTA are you?

U talking sh.it m8

jk i dont even play dota

I left LoL for Dota2 once ages ago...there was a reason why I came back to it and uninstalled Dota2 (AND Steam) after less than a week of it.

jk there were more than 10 reasons


In terms of games, I be playing Skyrim, CoD4 etc but 90% of my entertainment would be making music. So even though I'll be playing those games I'll hardy be playing it anyway, since it's offline games I can play a little at school :P
Are you going to play next week?.
Lol no it's the timing lol, nothing to do with wins or losses :P

Good luck in the future Airaze :)

EDIT: Oh right this is an AMA as well, uhh lets see...
Did your 1000th loss cause your decision to leave?
